plot: A tense businessman seeks to find a relaxing pastime but proves himself inept at golf, duck-hunting, and model plane building.
title: Out for Fun
plot_es: A tense businessman seeks to find a relaxing pastime but proves himself inept at golf, duck-hunting, and model plane building.
plot_en: A tense businessman seeks to find a relaxing pastime but proves himself inept at golf, duck-hunting, and model plane building.
